name: Castrol - Best Miles Ahead
description:
A facebook App for Castrol

Goals

Create a simple page app for Castrol "counting" (thru a simple algorithm) the number of miles before a big life event and then the user can share it with his friends.

Tools

  • Facebook Api
  • CoffeeScript
  • Docpad for Node.js

Made at

Blast Radius

Check it out

Best Miles Ahead
